title: Christ Kengeri vs PES for [BTech. CSE]?

comments.body:
Is christ even known for btech?
I think christ is known for it's bba or bcom degree

Replying to the ? and -  
*? Extremely competitive environment:* Like every college, you will find both sides, a competitive and chill; it's on you to decide which side to join xD  
  
*? Better faculty (not getting main campus only EC):* Subjective; PES is academic focused tho  
  
*- Feels like a school, coaching culture:* Yes  
  
\- *Campus is a concrete jungle (and I'm not a day-scholar) so I've to bear with it for 4 years:*  It will take exactly 3 weeks for you to get used to it, and, the new stuff building, is very very beautiful and amazing (i am envious)  
  
*- Seems overpriced (4.6L this year):* Yes
Man this is really, bad   you shouldn't compare pesu with such colleges,  pes is not that worst
I see, PES fee is an issue but I think I'll manage.
Thanks! It cleared a few things. I'm gonna try PES!
Bro compared chicken biryani and upma
What do you think PES is? You compare it with shitty Christ, bro stop this cancer!
